function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and natural light due to building envelope design","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission, poor indoor air quality, and reduced occupant well-being.","Mitigation":"Optimize building envelope design to maximize natural ventilation and light, incorporate air purification systems, and promote indoor plant growth.","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air purification systems, UV light disinfection, smart shading solutions.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, architects, designers.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, architects, designers."},{"Description":"Inadequate spacing and allocation for car parking","Impact":"Increased congestion and close contact between individuals in the parking area, leading to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Redesign parking area layout to increase spacing, implement digital parking systems to reduce contact, and improve ventilation and air quality in the parking area.","Technologies":"Digital parking management systems, ventilation and air filtration systems, automated parking guidance systems.","People":"Drivers, parking attendants, facility managers.","Owner":"Facility management, parking lot owners, urban planners."},{"Description":"Inefficient thermal performance of building envelope","Impact":"Higher energy consumption, indoor temperature fluctuations, and discomfort, leading to potential health issues and reduced resilience to temperature-related illnesses.","Mitigation":"Enhance insulation, improve window glazing, and implement energy-efficient HVAC systems to maintain thermal comfort and reduce energy demand.","Technologies":"High-performance insulation materials, double glazing windows, energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart thermostats.","People":"Building occupants, energy managers, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, energy management authorities."}]}
